TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to add user account.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on Add new user account button.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on add new user account button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on add new user account button .
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on add new user account button .

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter user name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter user name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter user name.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter first name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter first name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter first name.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter email.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter email.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter email.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter confirm email.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter confirm email.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter confirm email.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter password.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter password.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter password.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter confirm password.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter confirm password.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter confirm password.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select department.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select department.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select department.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select user role.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select user role.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select user role.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message.
